sections.title: Overview: Keras vs LightGBM
paragraphs: Keras (ml frameworks) is High-level neural-network API offering fast experimentation on top of TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.. It's known for API, Deep Learning, Prototyping.

LightGBM (ml frameworks) is Fast gradient boosting framework by Microsoft that uses tree-based learning algorithms with optimized memory usage and training speed.. Users choose it for Gradient Boosting, Microsoft, Fast Training.
